column3:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard If this check box is selected, the contact is the primary contact for the specified address ID. The check box can be selected only for one contact per supplier address.\f0\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard If this check box is selected, the contact is the secondary contact for the specified address ID. The check box can be selected only for one contact per supplier address.\f0\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard\f0 This is a free-text field of up to 2000 characters, in which you can enter any information. Notes are object-linked text, but they are never printed like document texts; instead they function as your own notes and comments for internal reference only. A note can be used as a means of forwarding information to someone who will process the object later. You can view and update the text in an editor reached by double-clicking in the field.\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard\f0 The general default mobile number entered on the Person\f0  record\f0 . If a contact address has been specified the default value for this address is shown. \f0 You can update an existing value in the IFS/Enterprise,Person/Comm. Method tab.\f0\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard\f0 The general default pager number entered on the Person\f0  record\f0 . If a contact address has been specified the default value for this address is shown. \f0 You can update an existing value in the IFS/Enterprise,Person/Comm. Method tab.\f0\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard\f0 The general default \f0 phone\f0  number entered on the Person\f0  record\f0 . If a contact address has been specified the default value for this address is shown. \f0 You can update an existing value in the IFS/Enterprise,Person/Comm. Method tab.\f0\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard\f0 The URL of the web page to be linked.\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard The name connected to the person ID. This value is retrieved from the person record in IFS/Enterprise. Any changes need to be performed in the person record.\f0\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard The persons title, e.g., Mr., Mrs. The use of the title field may vary.\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard\f0 If this check box is selected, it indicates that all the supplier addresses are connected to the specified contact.\f0\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard This field controls what default communication method values in Person/\b\i Comm. Method\b0\i0  tab should be shown in the fields such as \b Phone\b0 , \b Mobile\b0 , \b Fax\b0  etc. This field has no value by default, but it can be manually updated.\f0\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard\f0 The department of the contact that he/she works at this \f0 supplier.\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard\f0 The user responsible for the \f0 supplier\f0  contact.\f0\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard\f0 The name of the main representative.\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard\f0 The ID of the person you would like to register. This can be entered either manually or by selecting one from the List of Values. Only records that exist in IFS/Enterprise,\b\i Person\b0\i0  can be added this way. If you want to add a new person as a contact, use the right mouse button option \b Add Contact\b0  on the \b\i Contact\b0\i0  tab.\f0\par

}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard\f0 This is a free text description of the role the contact has in the current context.\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard The ID of the supplier address. If a contact person is to be connected to a single supplier address, a value should be entered in this field. The contact will then also be visible in IFS/Purchasing and  \b\i Supplier/Address/General Address Info\b0\i0  tab. No value is displayed in this field by default since the contact is regarded as a general supplier contact.\f0\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard\f0 This checkbox indicates that the contact is the primary contact for the supplier. Only one supplier primary contact can exist per supplier. This contact can if desired be connected to a specified supplier address.\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard\f0 This checkbox indicates that the contact is the secondary contact for the supplier. Only one supplier secondary contact can exist per supplier. This contact can if desired be connected to a specified supplier address.\par
}
